author: Adam Carlson
title: College Football 'Hall of Shame'? 6 odd reviews of Atlanta...
text:
Not everyone agrees on what makes the Atlanta's must-see list, with some iconic places occasionally receiving negative reviews.
But it's not just that: Some of the city's biggest tourest attractions, such as the College Football Hall of Fame, the High Museum of Art and the Fox Theatre, attract a slice of negative reviews that seem only tangentially related to them.
For example, here is a review left by jnrglover, who was angered after plans to attend the Georgia Auarium were foiled by the February winter storm â€” and its attendant state of emergency .
(A representative from the aquarium replied to explain the sudden emergency declaration and that "nearly every other attraction in the city of Atlanta was closed," and that the person's ticket would be refunded.)
